#summary Create Collaboration
#labels Use-Case

*Case Number:* UC005

*Case Name:* Create Collaboration

*Description:* An ISERN member wishes to create a new collaboration.

*Actors:*
  * Researcher – An ISERN member
  * System – The MyISERN application

*Frequency:* Above Average

*Preconditions:*
  * The researcher is viewing the homepage.
  * The researcher has a profile in the system.
  * The collaboration does not exist in the system.

*Postconditions:*
  * The collaboration is added to the system.
  * All participants for the collaboration are notified via email.

*Basic Course:*
|| *User* || *System* ||
|| 1. The researcher clicks on the create collaboration link. || 2. The system loads the new collaboration form. ||
|| 3. The researcher lists all researchers that will be involved, enters a brief proposal for the collaboration, and selects their name from a list as the proposer of the collaboration. ||  ||
|| 4. The researcher clicks on the save button. || 5. The system sends emails to all researchers listed in the collaboration saying that they've been invited to the collaboration and provides a link to the collaboration. ||
|| || 6. The system tells the user that the collaboration was added and all listed researchers notified. ||
|| || 7. The system loads the homepage. ||

*Alternate Course A:*
|| *User* || *System*||
|| A.1. The researcher doesn't know the name of the ISERN members that he wants to add to the collaboration so he clicks on the view gallery link. || A.2. The system loads the gallery page with thumbnails of all ISERN members and their names underneath the thumbnail. ||
|| A.3. The researcher clicks on the home link. || A.4. The system loads the homepage. ||
|| A.5. The researcher clicks on the create collaboration link. || A.6. The system loads the new collaboration form. ||
|| A.7. The researcher lists all researchers that will be involved, enters a brief proposal for the collaboration, and selects their name from a list as the proposer of the collaboration. ||  ||
|| A.8. The researcher clicks on the save button. || A.9. The system sends emails to all researchers listed in the collaboration saying that they've been invited to the collaboration and provides a link to the collaboration. ||
||  || A.10. The system tells the user that the collaboration was added and all listed researchers notified. ||
||  || A.11. The system loads the homepage. ||
